<title level="1" right="Rules">[Magical](/Rules.aspx?ID=1284)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 174</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Magically propelled vehicles are powered by spells, magic items, or an entirely magical engine. A magical propulsion system can be targeted with counteracting effects like [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), using the vehicle’s level and a standard DC for that level for the counteract check. A creature can use Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion (depending on the type of magic) for a magical vehicle’s piloting checks.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
